data.title: Bolesław III Wrymouth
data.meta_description:
Bolesław III Wrymouth - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. 1. Bolesław III Wrymouth was born in 1086 to Prince Władysław I Herman and his wife Judith of Bohemia. His mother Judith died shortly after giving birth to him.
2. There is some debate around the exact dates of Bolesław's birth and his mother Judith's death, with sources providing dates ranging from August 20th to December 26th for his birth and December 24th-25th for her death. 
3. Bolesław began ruling parts of Poland in the late 11th century during a period of weakened central government. He spent his early reign fighting with his half-brother Zbigniew for control of the country
